description: Create/destroy or attach/detach Block Storage volumes in DigitalOcean

droplet_id.description: The droplet id you want to operate on. Required when command=attach.

description.description: Description of the Block Storage volume.

region.description: The slug of the region where your Block Storage volume should be located in.

state.description: Indicate desired state of the target.

command.description: Which operation do you want to perform.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds used for polling DigitalOcean's API.

volume_name.description: The name of the Block Storage volume.

block_size.description: The size of the Block Storage volume in gigabytes. Required when command=create and state=present.
